p: After the incubation period, saliva was collected using the forced salivation technique. Briefly, mosquitoes were chilled, their wings and legs removed and the proboscis was inserted into 20 µL tip filled with 5 µL of Fetal Bovine Serum (FBS). After 45 min, medium containing the saliva was expelled into 1.5 mL tube containing 45 µL of Leibovitz L15 medium. For the colony from Tabarka, saliva was collected at different days: 1, 2, 3, 6, 9, 14 and 21 days after the exposure to the infectious blood-meal.
